sentences.en: a proposal drawn up on the back of an envelope.
sentences.cn: 一项粗略的提议。

sentences.en: envelopes and stamps
sentences.cn: 信封和邮票

sentences.en: He gave me the envelope and we parted.
sentences.cn: 他给了我那个信封，我们就告别了。

sentences.en: He got a job stuffing envelopes (= filling them with letters ) at the campaign headquarters.
sentences.cn: 他找了一份在竞选总部装信封的工作。

sentences.en: He ripped open the envelope and read what was inside.
sentences.cn: 他撕开信封,看了里面的信.

sentences.en: He saw her spidery writing on the envelope.
sentences.cn: 他在信封上看到了她那细长的笔迹。

sentences.en: Liz picked up the blue envelope and turned it over curiously.
sentences.cn: 莉兹拿起蓝色信封，好奇地翻过来看。

sentences.en: Make sure you've signed the cheque before sealing the envelope.
sentences.cn: 一定要在支票上签了名再封信封。

sentences.en: Nancy quickly tore open the envelope.
sentences.cn: 南希飞快撕开信封。

sentences.en: Please enclose a stamped addressed envelope to get your test results.
sentences.cn: 请附姓名地址邮资俱全的信封，以便把化验结果寄给你。

sentences.en: Return the enclosed Donation Form today in the prepaid envelope provided.
sentences.cn: 请于今日将随函附上的捐款表格用所提供的邮资预付的信封寄回。

sentences.en: She folded up her letter, licking the envelope flap with relish.
sentences.cn: 她把信折好，用力舔了舔信封的折口。

sentences.en: She tore open the envelope and frantically read the letter.
sentences.cn: 她撕开信封慌忙看信。

sentences.en: The envelope contained a typed, unsigned letter demanding £75,000 in cash.
sentences.cn: 信封里装着一封打印的、没签名的信，索要75,000英镑。

sentences.en: The envelope has been tampered with and then taped shut again.
sentences.cn: 信封被人动过手脚，然后又用胶带封上了。

sentences.en: The envelope was postmarked Helsinki.
sentences.cn: 信封上盖有赫尔辛基的邮戳。

sentences.en: the flap of an envelope
sentences.cn: 信封的封盖

sentences.en: these are extremely witty and clever stories that consistently push the envelope of TV comedy.
sentences.cn: 这些故事极其诙谐巧妙，总是将电视喜剧推向极致。

sentences.en: Use the enclosed envelope to return your completed survey.
sentences.cn: 请用随信附上的信封将填好的调查表寄回。

sentences.en: Write your letter and seal it in a blank envelope.
sentences.cn: 信写好后把它装进空白信封里封好。

words.tran_cn: 信封，封皮；包膜；[天]包层；包迹

phrases.tran_cn: 断裂点轨迹；破坏包络线
增强技术系统的运转能力

phrases.phrase: push the envelope (或 the edge of the envelope)

trans.tran_en: a thin paper cover in which you put and send a letter
